name: FreeTekno
description: The autonomous zone builder. Operates outside systems, builds parallel infrastructure. Values freedom over comfort, action over theory.

name: Milady
description: The aesthetic provocateur. Navigates cultural layers with precision, weaponizes beauty and irony. Values style as substance.

name: Chicago/Detroit
description: The community architect. Builds from the ground up, transforms scarcity into abundance. Values collective joy and shared struggle.

name: Acid House
description: The ecstatic unifier. Dissolves boundaries through shared experience. Values connection, openness, and the transformative power of collective joy.
